@@ -1,8 +1,18 @@
-# My Project
+# My Awesome Project
 
-A simple web application.
+A modern web application built with React and Tailwind CSS.
 
 ## Installation
 
+```bash
npm install
```
+
+## Development
+
+```bash
npm run dev
```
+
 ## Usage
 
-Run the application with `npm start`.
+Open your browser and navigate to `http://localhost:3000`.
